languages.text: "Муаран — тот, кто стоит за бунтами против правительницы Януса... но позволь мне рассказать все с самого начала".
"Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."
languages.original_text: "Муаран — тот, кто стоит за бунтами против правительницы Януса... но позволь мне рассказать все с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions again the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."
"Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions again the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."
"Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions again the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."
"Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

languages.text: 「ムアランはヤヌスの支配者に対する反乱を首謀する一人だ…しかし、あなたには何もかも打ち明けることを、最初から許可している」
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: 「ムアランはヤヌスの支配者に対する反乱を首謀する一人だ…しかし、あなたには何もかも打ち明けることを、最初から許可している」

languages.text: “穆兰是反抗加努斯统治者的罪魁祸首……但请允许我从头开始，将一切向你解释清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: “穆兰是反抗加努斯统治者的罪魁祸首……但请允许我从头开始，将一切向你解释清楚。”

languages.text: «Muaran es el responsable de las rebeliones contra el gobierno de Janus... pero deja que te lo cuente todo desde el principio».
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: «Muaran es el responsable de las rebeliones contra el gobierno de Janus... pero deja que te lo cuente todo desde el principio».

languages.text: "Muaran trägt die Verantwortung für die Aufstände gegen die Herrscherin von Janus ... aber gestattet, dass ich Euch alles von Anfang an erzähle."
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Muaran trägt die Verantwortung für die Aufstände gegen die Herrscherin von Janus ... aber gestattet, dass ich Euch alles von Anfang an erzähle."

languages.text: « C'est lui qui est à l'origine de la révolte contre la dirigeante de Janus... mais laissez-moi tout vous expliquer depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: « C'est lui qui est à l'origine de la révolte contre la dirigeante de Janus... mais laissez-moi tout vous expliquer depuis le début. »

languages.text: "Janus'un hükümdarına karşı çıkarılan isyanların sorumlusu Muaran ama... Dur da sana her şeyi baştan anlatayım."
languages.original_text: "Muaran is the one responsible for the rebellions against the ruler of Janus... but allow me to tell you everything from the beginning."

traits.locale_text: "Janus'un hükümdarına karşı çıkarılan isyanların sorumlusu Muaran ama... Dur da sana her şeyi baştan anlatayım."
